channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
hey, okay so i was adding a shop into my adminzone and i made the shop and the items i compiled and everything checked out.. then i did the run server and got this
[code]kingsplayground v2 Is currently running! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27) Terminate batch job (Y/N)?[/code]
can anyone make sense of this..?
also.. i am trying to make the saradomin sword hit like the great axe can someone help with that??
thanks
king

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

okay i don’t think it is me having to many items in one shop… i have cut the shop in half and instead of it being 1000 items i took it down to 100 then to 10
then to 1 of each
and it still does it…?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

haha wow am i slow!! i just told someone else that same thing… thanks for pointing out the obvious for me=]=][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 12:55:05 am[/size][hr]well thanks
but it didn’t help…

i narrowed the one shop down to two small shops and instead of 1000 items of each i put 10 of each and deleted a shop i don’t need, unless you mean its too many objects in the shop… not the number in the shop if so then i gotta delete another shop

Read full topic
